kindred.client.model

Class Battle

  • Object
    • kindred.client.model.Battle

  • public class Battle
extends Object
    Calculates damage caused by a Unit to another Unit.
    Author:
    Kindred Team

      • luck

        private final double luck
        Value added or subtracted to damage. Makes battles less predictable.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Battle

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public int execute(Tile attacker,
                   Tile defender)
        Checks if the Unit in the attacker Tile will hit the Unit in the defender Tile. Supposes that both given Tiles have a Unit placed on them.

        Returns an integer representing damage:

        • If damage = 0, then the attack missed.
        • If damage > 0, then it represents the damage received by the defending Unit.
        Parameters:
        attacker - Tile containing the attacking Unit
        defender - Tile containing the defending Unit
        Returns:
        damage received by the defending unit if the attack hit, or 0 otherwise

      • checkHit

        private boolean checkHit(double attackerAgi,
                         double defenderAgi)
        Checks if an attack will hit by comparing the attacker's agility with the defender's. Returns true if attack will happen or false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        attackerAgi - agility of the attacking Unit, already considering the Terrain modifier
        defenderAgi - agility of the defending Unit, already considering the Terrain modifier
        Returns:
        true if the attack succeeded, or false otherwise

      • randomInteger

        private int randomInteger(int min,
                          int max)
        Randomly generates and returns an integer in the interval [min, max]. Supposes that min ≤ max.
        Parameters:
        min - minimum possible integer that can be generated
        max - maximum possible integer that can be generated
        Returns:
        an integer in range [min, max]
